messages.author: justinlin
messages.text: These two lines go away if adding a WebContents::GetFullscreenWidgetRoutingID() method doesn't make sense.

messages.author: Yuri
messages.text:
On 2013/01/19 01:17:52, justinlin wrote:
> These two lines go away if adding a WebContents::GetFullscreenWidgetRoutingID()
> method doesn't make sense.

Put these two lines at the end of LookUpAndObserveWebContents(), since they only need to be executed once.  The observer callbacks should take care of updating fullscreen_widget_id_ from then onwards.

messages.author: justinlin
messages.text:
On 2013/01/19 02:14:47, Yuri wrote:
> On 2013/01/19 01:17:52, justinlin wrote:
> > These two lines go away if adding a
> WebContents::GetFullscreenWidgetRoutingID()
> > method doesn't make sense.
> 
> Put these two lines at the end of LookUpAndObserveWebContents(), since they only
> need to be executed once.  The observer callbacks should take care of updating
> fullscreen_widget_id_ from then onwards.

Yes, good point! Done.
